title: Mercearia Bio
description: An all organic food store with organic coffee shop service, by the riverside in Portimao. Online store with home deliveries nationwide (Portugal). Their organic product range includes fresh fruit and vegetables, cereals, pastas, juices, leguminous plants, snacks, tofu, seitan, jams, teas, coffees, wines, among other organic food products. Moved to this new space from Rua 25 de Abril in Apr 2014.
streetAddress: Rua das Comunicações, Edificio Casa do Rio Loja C
